Hour
I must admit I have found it all a bit
difficult I'm used to asking the

it emotionally quite difficult too
because up until now I've been
deliberately almost in denial about my
condition I I don't ask the doctors all
the questions but my journalistic
colleagues have been probing there's

the message is getting out there for
more donors for some 8,000 people in

so I do hope that the publicity has
helped in some way
I was commissioned to write a book
shortly before I was diagnosed it's been
a lifeline in many ways because it makes
a huge destruction in my life I try and
write three hours a day both while I'm
at home waiting for the donor and when
I'm receiving treatment in hospital if I
